00008 HBITMAP DLL_CALLCONV
00009 FreeImageAlgorithms_FibToHBitmap(FIBITMAP *dib)
00010 {
00011         DWORD error;
00012 
00013         HDC dc = GetDC(NULL);
00014 
00015         if(dc == NULL) {
00016                 std::cout <<"NULL DC" << std::endl;
00017                 return NULL;
00018         }
00019 
00020         HBITMAP bitmap = CreateDIBitmap(dc, FreeImage_GetInfoHeader(dib),
00021                 CBM_INIT, FreeImage_GetBits(dib), FreeImage_GetInfo(dib), DIB_RGB_COLORS); 
00022 
00023         if(bitmap == NULL) {
00024 
00025                 error = GetLastError();
00026                 std::cout << error << std::endl;
00027  
00028                 return NULL;
00029         }
00030 
00031         ReleaseDC(NULL, dc);            
00032         DeleteDC (dc);
00033 
00034         return bitmap;
00035 }

00045 FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV
00046 FreeImageAlgorithms_HBitmapToFIB(HDC hdc, HBITMAP bitmap)
00047 {
00048         FIBITMAP *dib = NULL;
00049         BITMAP bm;
00050         int nColors;
00051 
00052         if(bitmap) { 
00053 
00054                 GetObject(bitmap, sizeof(BITMAP), (LPSTR) &bm);
00055  
00056                 dib = FreeImage_Allocate(bm.bmWidth, bm.bmHeight, bm.bmBitsPixel, 0, 0, 0);
00057   
00058                 nColors = FreeImage_GetColorsUsed(dib);
00059 
00060                 GetDIBits(hdc, bitmap, 0, FreeImage_GetHeight(dib), 
00061                         FreeImage_GetBits(dib), FreeImage_GetInfo(dib), DIB_RGB_COLORS);
00062   
00063                 // restore BITMAPINFO members
00064                 FreeImage_GetInfoHeader(dib)->biClrUsed = nColors;
00065                 FreeImage_GetInfoHeader(dib)->biClrImportant = nColors;
00066         }
00067 
00068         return dib;
00069 }

00072 HBITMAP DLL_CALLCONV 
00073 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetDibSection(FIBITMAP *src, HDC hdc, int left, int top, int right, int bottom)
00074 {
00075         if(!src) 
00076                 return NULL;
00077 
00078         unsigned bpp = FreeImage_GetBPP(src);
00079 
00080         if(bpp <=4)
00081                 return NULL;
00082 
00083         // normalize the rectangle
00084         if(right < left)
00085                 INPLACESWAP(left, right);
00086 
00087         if(bottom < top)
00088                 INPLACESWAP(top, bottom);
00089 
00090         // check the size of the sub image
00091         int src_width  = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00092         int src_height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00093         int src_pitch = FreeImage_GetPitch(src);
00094 
00095         if((left < 0) || (right > src_width) || (top < 0) || (bottom > src_height))
00096                 return NULL;
00097 
00098         // allocate the sub image
00099         int dst_width = (right - left);
00100         int dst_height = (bottom - top);
00101 
00102         BITMAPINFO *info = (BITMAPINFO *) malloc(sizeof(BITMAPINFO) + (FreeImage_GetColorsUsed(src) * sizeof(RGBQUAD)));
00103         BITMAPINFOHEADER *bih = (BITMAPINFOHEADER *)info;
00104 
00105         bih->biSize = sizeof(BITMAPINFOHEADER);
00106         bih->biWidth = dst_width;
00107         bih->biHeight = dst_height;
00108         bih->biPlanes = 1;
00109         bih->biBitCount = bpp;
00110         bih->biCompression = BI_RGB;
00111         bih->biSizeImage = 0;
00112     bih->biXPelsPerMeter = 0;
00113     bih->biYPelsPerMeter = 0;
00114         bih->biClrUsed = 0;           // Always use the whole palette.
00115     bih->biClrImportant = 0;
00116 
00117         // copy the palette
00118         if(bpp < 16)
00119                 memcpy(info->bmiColors, FreeImage_GetPalette(src), FreeImage_GetColorsUsed(src) * sizeof(RGBQUAD));
00120 
00121         BYTE *dst_bits;
00122 
00123         HBITMAP hbitmap = CreateDIBSection(hdc, info, DIB_RGB_COLORS, (void **) &dst_bits, NULL, 0);
00124 
00125         free(info);
00126 
00127         if(hbitmap == NULL || dst_bits == NULL)
00128                 return NULL;
00129 
00130         // get the pointers to the bits and such
00131         BYTE *src_bits = FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, src_height - top - dst_height);
00132 
00133         // calculate the number of bytes per pixel
00134         unsigned bytespp = FreeImage_GetLine(src) / FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00135         
00136         // point to x = left
00137         src_bits += (left * bytespp);   
00138 
00139         int dst_line = (dst_width * bpp + 7) / 8;
00140         int dst_pitch = (dst_line + 3) & ~3;
00141 
00142         for(int y = 0; y < dst_height; y++)
00143                 memcpy(dst_bits + (y * dst_pitch), src_bits + (y * src_pitch), dst_line);
00144 
00145         return hbitmap;
00146 }

00149 int DLL_CALLCONV
00150 FreeImageAlgorithms_CopyToDibSection(FIBITMAP *src, HBITMAP hbitmap, int left, int top, int right, int bottom)
00151 {
00152         BYTE *src_bits;
00153         int src_width, src_height, src_pitch;
00154         unsigned bytespp;
00155         BYTE *dst_bits;
00156         int y, dst_width, dst_height;
00157         int dst_line;
00158         int bpp;
00159         BITMAP bm;
00160 
00161         if(!src) 
00162                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00163 
00164         GetObject(hbitmap, sizeof(BITMAP), &bm);
00165 
00166         dst_bits = (BYTE*) bm.bmBits;
00167 
00168         if(dst_bits == NULL)
00169                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00170 
00171         // normalize the rectangle
00172         if(right < left)
00173                 INPLACESWAP(left, right);
00174 
00175         if(bottom < top)
00176                 INPLACESWAP(top, bottom);
00177 
00178         // check the size of the sub image
00179         src_width  = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00180         src_height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00181         src_pitch = FreeImage_GetPitch(src);
00182 
00183         if((left < 0) || (right > src_width) || (top < 0) || (bottom > src_height))
00184                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00185 
00186         // allocate the sub image
00187         dst_width = right - left;
00188         dst_height = bottom - top;
00189 
00190         // get the pointers to the bits and such
00191         src_bits = FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, src_height - top - dst_height);
00192 
00193         // calculate the number of bytes per pixel
00194         bytespp = FreeImage_GetLine(src) / src_width;
00195         
00196         // point to x = left
00197         src_bits += (left * bytespp);   
00198 
00199         bpp = FreeImage_GetBPP(src);
00200 
00201         dst_line = (dst_width * bpp + 7) / 8;
00202 
00203         dst_bits += ((bm.bmHeight - dst_height) * bm.bmWidthBytes);
00204 
00205         for(y = 0; y < dst_height; y++)
00206                 memcpy(dst_bits + (y * bm.bmWidthBytes), src_bits + (y * src_pitch), dst_line);
00207 
00208         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00209 }

00212 HBITMAP DLL_CALLCONV
00213 FreeImageAlgorithms_CreateDibSection(HDC hdc, int width, int height, int bpp, int colours_used, RGBQUAD* bmiColours)
00214 {
00215         HBITMAP hbitmap;
00216         BITMAPINFO *info;
00217         BITMAPINFOHEADER *bih;
00218 
00219         void *bits;
00220 
00221         if(bpp > 8)
00222                 colours_used = 0;       
00223 
00224         info = (BITMAPINFO *) malloc(sizeof(BITMAPINFO) + (colours_used * sizeof(RGBQUAD)));
00225         bih = (BITMAPINFOHEADER *)info;
00226 
00227         bih->biSize = sizeof(BITMAPINFOHEADER);
00228         bih->biWidth = width;
00229         bih->biHeight = height;
00230         bih->biPlanes = 1;
00231         bih->biBitCount = bpp;
00232         bih->biCompression = BI_RGB;
00233         bih->biSizeImage = 0;
00234     bih->biXPelsPerMeter = 0;
00235     bih->biYPelsPerMeter = 0;
00236         bih->biClrUsed = 0;           // Always use the whole palette.
00237     bih->biClrImportant = 0;
00238 
00239         // copy the palette
00240         if(bpp < 16)
00241                 memcpy(info->bmiColors, bmiColours, colours_used * sizeof(RGBQUAD));
00242 
00243         hbitmap = CreateDIBSection(hdc, info, DIB_RGB_COLORS, &bits, NULL, 0);
00244 
00245         free(info);
00246 
00247         if(hbitmap == NULL || bits == NULL)
00248                 return NULL;
00249 
00250         return hbitmap;
00251 }
